channel.title: TV show trailers
channel.description:
This thread is for previews, upcoming episode teasers & anything to do with a tv show in media format.
if yo are looking to post a movie trailer, post here.
[url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/forums/showthread.php?t=64[/url]
Else wise, stops those lovely tv trailers here.
[COLOR='Red']Double posting is allowed if you have a new trailer and wish to share.

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
@ raw_bean

I was aware of what The Plan was about (Cylon conspiracy leading up to the Fall of the 12 Colonies) but I could have sworn there was another movie also planned. io9.com steered me wrong it appears.

Can’t wait to see more of Brother Cavil though, he was quite the compelling character that after the series finale really deserved more attention about his motives (which were almost kinda strangely Freudian).

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
InterloperX:

The new V series does look really cool. Damn, I hope Michael Ironside appears in the new incarnation of the show somehow, dude is BAMF.

Agreed. But then, everything’s better with Michael Ironside in it.

InterloperX:

Looking forward to The Plan as well, IIRC think there is also another movie based on the Destruction of the Colonies slated as well.

That is The Plan, it’s going to show the destruction of the colonies from the Cylon perspective, amongst other things.

InterloperX:

All in all, cool idea for a thread.

Tell that to the flaming trolls.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
Grum: how about the sensible conversation that’s broken out in the thread, despite all the petty bitching attempts? As good a reason for a thread as any. If you don’t like a thread, don’t look at it. It’s not hard.

On topic: I’ve just finished my final year of uni and, after this weekend’s camping trip, I’m looking forward to having some time to catch up with TV shows. I have entire seasons of Heroes and Chuck to catch up on :o

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: Crunchy
item.description:
Grand_General_Hot:

Has Jay finally left the show? if so, about time.

I’m not really sure how they’re doing it timewise and everything but:

Starting in June Conan will be hosting the Tonight Show. Fallon is already hosting Latenight (horrible horrible job). Leno is getting his own show in the fall presumably called the Jay Leno Show.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
The new V series does look really cool. Damn, I hope Michael Ironside appears in the new incarnation of the show somehow, dude is BAMF.

Looking forward to The Plan as well, IIRC think there is also another movie based on the Destruction of the Colonies slated as well.

I wasn’t the biggest fan of Stargate Atlantis, it just struck me as SG-1, same type of characters with different actors, I didn’t find it took the series to any new places, but I’m sold on Universe, mostly because of Robert Carlyle. Dude rocks.

All in all, cool idea for a thread.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: Grand_General_Hot
item.description:
You know, I’ve never been a Moderator friend, Moderator types have never been online pal’s, have you ever considered your attitude towards me is giving you infractions, like I’ve done nothing to you, absolutely nothing to you, posted a few videos, that’s it, and you, threat me like shit for no reason. Not even a valid reason.

i don’t know if you noticed or not, but there been a lack of video’s from me in the last few days, I’ve posted 1 video yesterday, the natural selection video and that was in the video thread, the one that was made for games trailer.

and today, I made this thread, so all the TV show clips/trailers/previews could go, just like the video game thread. Like RB stated, the way he’d like to see it, clean and neat, respect the wishes of others, doesn’t mean I like the wishes, but I respect them, if they ask nicely, if they don’t act in a treating manner & if they don’t call me names.

So I ask you, what the hell, did I do to you, to deserve such childish name calling.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
It’s not obvious to me that he’s trying to spam the forums. I told him off when he was posting too many threads by creating one for each video he wanted to post, and suggested he clump them together into general threads instead. He’s done exactly what I asked. Now I’m going to ask you to refrain from posting in here unless you have something meaningful to say on the topic at hand.

[COLOR=‘Red’]This goes for everyone. On topic and flame-free or I hand out more infractions.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
Another infraction? C’mon! The first one was from some noob that asked “r u makin oppozin forz remak?” So I took what I thought was the necessary action of calling him a retard. And aren’t we all sick of Grand_General_Patrick_Stewart_Whannabee’s stupid threads about trailers of stuff no one gives a shit about?! I mean, he’s obviously trying to spam the fourms!

But whatever. I’ll report him and we’ll all be at peace.

Read full topic

item.title: TV show trailers
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
blue:

v cool ? More like cheesy name, stupid plot. And who the hell names something v when it will obviusly remind you of v for vendetta O_o
the only thing im glad about is that, this will be the last sezon of lost ;D

It’s a remake of a very famous and very well regarded TV mini-series from the eighties (and various spin-off series and mini-series that were not so well reviewed), which was being made at the same time as the first issues of V for Vendetta was being written, so there’s practically no chance the inventors of V had even heard of V for Vendetta, and that’s even assuming they hadn’t picked out the name before V for Vendetta’s first issue was even published, which might not be the case.

Read full topic
